original_text: That will be a very bad time for women who are soon to have a baby! It will also be a bad time for those women who have little babies! Yes, very bad things will happen to all the people of this country. God will be very angry with the people who live here.
korean_text: 그 날에는 아이 밴 자들과 젖먹이는 자들에게 화가 있으리니 이는 땅에 큰 환난과 이 백성에게 진노가 있겠음이로다

sentences.original_text: That will be a very bad time
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 매우 나쁜 시간이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for women who are soon to have a baby
It will also be a bad time
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 또한 나쁜 시간이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for those women who have little babies
Yes, very bad things will happen
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 매우 나쁜 일들이 일어날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to all the people of this country
with the people who live here
